A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A wonderful sequel to The Force Awakens\, The Last Jedi is a fantastic movie with many intriguing scenes and a strong plot. The acting was amazing\, the directing was spot-on\, and this movie produced some of the most memorable sequences I have had the pleasure of watching.  Fans that are interested in the lore of the force will be in awe at the ending and what it means for several characters\, I know I was. Definitely a movie to see and watch again for fans and moviegoers alike.
